comment_text: It's been 11 YEARS?!!! Thank you Vsauce for everything over the last decade.

Well it all started by you thinking "hey i want to see what vsauces first videos were" and then you were left hanging with your jaw open in disbelief as you watched video after video in order of release with a mixture of horror and shock. Then you get to this video and you close your jaw for the first time and say "that was actually kinda dope ngl"
Mine craft
Just as these old videos are a window into the past, videos referencing Covid-19 will seem very weird in 10 years.
